sentences.en: A screwdriver and a hammer are the only tools you need.
sentences.cn: 你需用的工具只是改锥和锤子.

sentences.en: Dean tried to stab him with a screwdriver.
sentences.cn: 迪安试图用一把改锥捅他。

sentences.en: Don't go your entire life as a “hammer” doing the job of a “screwdriver.
sentences.cn: 不要如此度过你的一生：明明是“锤子”却做着“螺丝刀”的工作。

sentences.en: Have you brought my screwdriver back yet?
sentences.cn: 你把我的螺丝刀带来了 吗 ?

sentences.en: He gouged her cheek with a screwdriver.
sentences.cn: 他用螺丝刀戳她的脸颊。

sentences.en: He pried the box open with a screwdriver.
sentences.cn: 他用螺丝起子将箱子撬开.

sentences.en: He took a screwdriver and teased out the remaining screws.
sentences.cn: 他拿出螺丝刀把其余的螺丝卸了下来.

sentences.en: I couldn't get any purchase with the screwdriver on the damn screws.
sentences.cn: 我用螺丝刀拧那些该死的螺丝钉时一点也使不上劲儿。

sentences.en: I wasn't able to use your screwdriver , but thanks all the same , ie for lending it.
sentences.cn: 我没用上您的改锥, 还是要谢谢您.

sentences.en: I'll need that screwdriver to loosen these screws.
sentences.cn: 我需要那只改锥旋松这些螺丝.

sentences.en: It would be a tragedy to go your entire life as a “hammer,” doing the job of a “screwdriver.” Everybody has a purpose, a reason they were created.
sentences.cn: 如果你明明是“锤子”却做着“螺丝刀”的工作，那真的是一个悲剧。每个人都有个目标，那便是他们被创造的理由。

sentences.en: So, put down the hammer and screwdriver, and place the socket over the nut and turn.
sentences.cn: 那么，放下锤子和螺丝刀，将套筒扳手放到螺母上拧动。

sentences.en: The electric drill can also be used as a screwdriver.
sentences.cn: 这把电钻也可用作螺丝刀.

sentences.en: Whose screwdriver you think is in that fella's head?
sentences.cn: 你以为插在那家伙头上的螺丝刀是谁的?

sentences.en: Will you go and fetch me a screwdriver, please?
sentences.cn: 请你去给我拿把改锥来, 好吗?

sentences.en: You turn the screws round and round with a screwdriver.
sentences.cn: 你用螺丝刀把螺丝拧几圈.

words.tran_cn: 拧紧（screw的ing形式）；用螺钉固定

trans.tran_cn: 螺丝刀，螺丝起子，改锥，伏特加橙汁鸡尾酒
trans.tran_en: a tool with a narrow blade at one end that you use for turning screws
